caption:
A community member generously gifted us a framed copy of We Fall and Get Up, a group poem created by members of Portland’s immigrant community on World Refugee Day 2015. For many of us, it was the first time reading it.

The poem was written as part of The Power to Tell Stories, an event where people came together to share their experiences of starting over in a new place. We knew we had to share it here too! Have you read it before, or were you part of the group who created it?

You can read the full poem in the next two slides. →
